title: Minna Agechau♡
alternative_title: I Give My All, I'll Do it With Anyone, I'm All Yours, みんなあげちゃう♡
description: A beautiful day Rokurou, a student, was to masturbate when a beautiful girl knocks on his door: You need a virgin? And so begins the story. Rokurou did not know what it was that this beautiful girl was a millionaire family.
